name: Dialtone
long_description:
Dialtone helps enterprises transform cross-functional, cross-system tasks into intelligent, self-running workflows. Companies across technology, sports and entertainment, healthcare, finance, and retail deploy Dialtone Agents to speed up both internal operations and customer-facing processes.

What sets us apart:
1. Agentic AI delivered on day one: Our platform couples cutting-edge AI infrastructure with built-in reliability, security, and observability so teams can launch production-grade agents in days, not months.
2. White-glove engineering included: Dedicated engineering support to help end-to-end, from scoping to launch to continuous optimization - at no extra cost.
3. Success over software: We measure our impact by real business outcomes, not seat counts. If our agents aren’t moving the needle, we’re not done.

Dialtone offers an intuitive no-code builder for designing and launching agents, a full API for programmatic control, secure custom actions that connect to proprietary systems, and an ever-expanding library of integrations with the SaaS tools enterprises already depend on.
